description: This file declares the Response class, which is a derived class of Core::JSONRPC::Message, used for handling JSON-RPC responses within the WebSockets plugin of the WPEFramework. It provides methods to access response ID, determine if the response is a result or error, and retrieve the corresponding JSON objects.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response details such as ID, result, and error status.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response message.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object from the response if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response if present.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the response is valid.
